Text.Page:
, I have to apologize to you. I explained to my son that I had help catching dinner, but he was so excited about the eels that he ran out and started telling people what a great angler I am.

I hate to ask, but can you help me again?"What do you need?"
Well... I've renounced fishing, you see, but he expects me to come home with an even bigger fish. I was wondering...<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Just tell me what you need."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

I thought that if we caught the biggest fish possible from this Fishery, the Fairy Snakehead, he'll stop expecting more from me.

I know this is a tremendous favor, but I'll definitely reward you for your efforts.

I can also give you a little advice-if you want to catch a Big-Ass Fish, you have to do it yourself. They're too crafty to fall for a simple lure on a timer.
Paparong's son was so excited about the fish Paparong brought home that he started bragging to all his friends. <PCNAME> took pity on the poor popori and helped him catch a whopper.
You really caught it! Hooray! now I can hang up my fishing rod forever!

Have you caught the Fairy Snakehead?

Remember that you have to catch it manuallyâ€“you'll need to reel it in yourself!
